ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: I raved about it to students because I found it to be such an important topic with such a powerfully engaged philosopher (Pogge).

Yes, I would definitely recommend the course to other students and have done so, in fact.In summary, the course provides for philosophical considerations regarding some of the most important global political issues of our time, e.g., worldwide poverty and injustices in the structure of our global political order.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: It helped to shape my vision for the kind of work I want to do. It had a major impact.
This course helped me to delve deeper into some topics I have been wanting to explore for quite a while. In this sense, the course really contributed to furthering my personal research interests.
